captions.text: (Put out my lipstick)
(Put out my lipstick)

Your standards are high 
Do you have a girlfriend
You look indifferent
Look like not interested at all

I know you are interested 
I can see it all over the place

You have a beautiful nose 
Your eyes are making me melt

Your bronzed skin look sweet 
I want to steal you

Put out my lipstick 
Put it on my lips

On your white shirt 
I put on my lipstick

Put out my lipstick 
I kiss your lips

I put lipstick secretly on
your collarbone
Put it on secretly

Don't know how that happened 
Is there a story
You look a bit angry

Actually a little bit sorry 
But I know you're having fun
You are smiling secretly

I'm falling in your watery eyes 
Your scent is making me drunk

Your silky skin looks dazzling 
I want to steal you

Put out my lipstick 
Put it on my lips

On your white shirt 
I put on my lipstick

Put out my lipstick 
I kiss your lips

I put lipstick secretly on
your collarbone
Put it on secretly

Don't go away from me 
I can't let you go
(you you you)

Don't be like this 
We have just met

Put out my lipstick 
Put it on my lips

On your white shirt 
I put on my lipstick

Put out my lipstick 
I kiss your lips

I put lipstick secretly on
your collarbone
Put it on secretly

comments.author: Eyup Mi Duck

comments.text:
In Korea, I don't think the usage of Youtube and Google services in general 
is encouraged. Just like in all countries with Internet, they usually have 
their own search engine and social media systems. (Ex: In China, QQ is 
equivalent to Facebook for people in the US. Another example: The US has 
websites like "4chan", with awful memes and 9 year old kids, South Korea 
has "Ilbe".)

element.

from western MV's but every Orange Caramel MV is genius. Other than Orange

them look like "little girls" is because that's what they are. PS-95%?
